SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.gtnet.handler.impl.historyquote

Class BaseHistoryquoteQueryStrategy

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.gtnet.handler.impl.historyquote.BaseHistoryquoteQueryStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
HistoryquoteQueryStrategy
Direct Known Subclasses:
OpenHistoryquoteQueryStrategy, PushOpenHistoryquoteQueryStrategy
public abstract class BaseHistoryquoteQueryStrategy extends Object implements HistoryquoteQueryStrategy
Abstract base class providing common functionality for historyquote query strategies. Shared functionality includes:
  • Tuple building for batch queries (ISIN+currency or fromCurrency+toCurrency)
  • Request map creation for O(1) lookup by instrument key
  • Conversion of Historyquote and GTNetHistoryquote to HistoryquoteRecordDTO
  • Response DTO building with instrument identification and records
  • Date utility methods including 10-day threshold optimization
See Also:
  • for AC_OPEN mode implementation
  • for AC_PUSH_OPEN mode implementation

  • Field Details

    • THRESHOLD_DAYS

      protected static final int THRESHOLD_DAYS
      Threshold in days for batch query optimization. Requests older than this threshold use the threshold date to avoid excessive data fetching.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • filterRecordsByDateRange

      protected List<HistoryquoteRecordDTO> filterRecordsByDateRange(List<HistoryquoteRecordDTO> records, Date fromDate, Date toDate)
      Filters historyquote records to keep only those within the specified date range.
      Parameters:
      records - list of records to filter
      fromDate - start date (inclusive)
      toDate - end date (inclusive)
      Returns:
      filtered list containing only records within the date range

    • determineBatchFromDate

      protected <T> Date determineBatchFromDate(List<T> instruments, Map<String,InstrumentHistoryquoteDTO> requestMap, Date thresholdDate, Function<T,String> keyExtractor)
      Determines the optimal batch fromDate using the 10-day threshold optimization. If all requested fromDates are within the threshold, uses the oldest fromDate. Otherwise, uses the threshold date to avoid fetching excessive data for all instruments.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the instrument type
      Parameters:
      instruments - list of instruments
      requestMap - map of requests
      thresholdDate - the threshold date (typically THRESHOLD_DAYS ago)
      keyExtractor - function to extract the lookup key from an instrument
      Returns:
      the optimal batch fromDate
